content: {"name": "mRelief SNAP Screener - Boston", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\" https://www.mass.gov/massachusetts-summer-ebt-program\nGo to https://apply.mrelief.com/screener or text \"Food\" to 74544 to check eligibility.\n", "email": "", "url": "https://apply.mrelief.com/screener", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "", "address_2": null, "city": "Boston", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3564439, "longitude": -71.1193016}}
